ComicInfo.Summary: Who says you can't teach an old dog new tricks, or a new dog some old tricks, for that matter? Leo Kragg is an old man whose days of being an avenger of justice have long past. Enter Scott Kida, a young art student with a penchant for martial arts. Will Scott, under Leo's tutelage, become the new Prowler and right the injustices that the law allows? You'll never know unless you buy the comic! In this issue: Blood and Magic, in which we meet Leo and Scott and find out how these 2 came to be the newest crime-fighting team.
